data.message: Help!!! My newsfeed on my iPhone app has been frozen and will not refresh since yesterday! When I go to most recent it shows posts from yesterday after a few recent ones. This is so frustrating!!!!!

replies.message: Hi Molly. Thanks for reaching out. Please report what you're experiencing to us here: http://bit.ly/2wkKlCR. -Stephanie
Facebook I did yesterday. My frustration is growi g
Hey Molly. Due to the volume of reports we receive, it may take us some time to get to yours. We appreciate your patience! -Elizabeth
Facebook I understand but based on the reviews in the App Store most people are having the same issues with the newsfeed and the ability to see new posts in the app.
Thedistant View I have an iPhone but I did uninstall the app and re downloaded it. Still didn't work.

I have the same problem since the last 4 weeks. I have reported so many times. Sometimes after I report it's fixed but won't last for longer than an hour. It's so frustrating. My newsfeed is either stuck on old stuff and won't load or it shows network error
